Package ml.alternet.security.auth.hasher

Concrete hashers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Argon2Hasher.Argon2Bridge
    A bridge with any Argon2 implementation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Argon2Hasher
    The Argon2 hasher.
    Argon2Hasher.Bridge
    A bridge with the Argon2 algorithm.
    BCryptHasher
    The BCrypt hasher.
    BCryptHasher.Digest
    BCrypt truncate passwords to 72 bytes, and some other minor quirks.
    HasherBase<T extends CryptParts>
    Convenient base class for hasher implementations.
    MD5BasedHasher
    The MD5 based BSD password algorithm 1 and apr1 (Apache variant).
    MessageHasher
    The hasher is based on Java's message digests.
    PBKDF1Hasher  
    PBKDF2Hasher
    A slightly modified PBKDF2 hasher, that erase intermediate data.
    PlainTextHasher
    Just encode the chars with the charset supplied without hashing ; DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION.
    SaltedMessageHasher
    Compute a checksum as the raw digest of the the string {password}{salt}.
    SHA2Hasher
    The SHA-256/512 hash algorithms in a libc6 crypt() compatible way.
    UnixCryptHasher
    The Unix Crypt hasher.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Argon2Hasher.Argon2Bridge.Type
    Argon2 variants.
    SHA2Hasher.Algorithm
    List of SHA algorithms with their variations.

Package ml.alternet.security.auth.hasher Description

Concrete hashers.
